Senyuu+

Back to the main page

Go to Senyuu on Mangadex for the full series and a better reader. This is an alternative solution for when Mangadex is down and for those who cannot access Mangadex without a VPN. No content is actually hosted on this site: this is simply a viewer for content hosted elsewhere.

Please do not upload these chapters onto any for-profit manga aggregation sites. But if Mangadex shuts down, feel free to upload to a new Batoto/Mangadex replacement.

⬅ Volume Index Volume ➡

The first 50 chapters listed here were scanlated by Battlebrave!
